metadata.title: CVE-2017-18214 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
The moment module before 2.19.3 for Node.js is prone to a regularexpression denial of service via a crafted date string, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2016-4055.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-moment - 2.20.1+ds-1
node-moment - 2.20.1+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-moment package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.1+ds-1').
